alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:37PM MDT until May 27 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 436 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Devils Tower Junction, or 16 miles west of Sundance, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 432 PM MDT, ping pong ball sized hail was reported east of Pine Haven. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Devils Tower Junction around 440 PM MDT. Devils Tower National Monument around 450 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hulett. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
